intro: Psychotria neodouarrei, commonly known as the Neodouarrei Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly in countries like Colombia and Ecuador. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments, typically found in the undergrowth of tropical rainforests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
